name: part_002
file: tmp_《Peafowl of The Blue Flame》 Pavolia Reine 3D Birthday Live 2025 #ReineMEPtember2025 [zKuxe-5Jxyc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'CRZY' by Vivid BAD SQUAD.
Transition with audience cheering and black screen.
MC section where Reine introduces herself and talks about the concert theme and previous songs.

subtitles.original: わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Perhatian sang putri merak yang tertiup angin. Aku Pavolia Reine dari Hololive ID.
subtitles.english: Attention, the peacock princess blown by the wind. I am Pavolia Reine from Hololive ID.

subtitles.original: Attention please, I'm Reine from Hololive ID Generation 2!
subtitles.english: Attention please, I'm Reine from Hololive ID Generation 2!

subtitles.original: 皆様ごきげんよう、私ホロライブインドネシア二期生パヴォリア・レイネと申しますの！
subtitles.english: Greetings everyone, I am Pavolia Reine of Hololive Indonesia's 2nd Generation!

subtitles.original: And welcome to Pavolia Reine's Peafowl of the Blue Flame!
subtitles.english: And welcome to Pavolia Reine's Peafowl of the Blue Flame!

subtitles.original: Yay! Pavolia Reine's 2025 Birthday! Welcome!
subtitles.english: Yay! Pavolia Reine's 2025 Birthday! Welcome!

subtitles.original: いぇーい、ようこそ！
subtitles.english: Yay, welcome!

subtitles.original: えーと、左上にハッシュタグがありまして...
subtitles.english: Um, there's a hashtag on the upper left...

subtitles.original: There's a hashtag on the upper left corner...
subtitles.english: There's a hashtag on the upper left corner...

subtitles.original: ...it reads #ReineMEPtember2025...
subtitles.english: ...it reads #ReineMEPtember2025...

subtitles.original: ...which is the pretty much same hashtag I've been using for the past few years, yeah?
subtitles.english: ...which is pretty much the same hashtag I've been using for the past few years, yeah?

subtitles.original: And if you guys have any thoughts throughout the live, anything, you can write it...
subtitles.english: And if you guys have any thoughts throughout the live, anything, you can write it...

subtitles.original: ...and I'll be looking forward to them. ご感想とか色々、皆さんも書くことができます。
subtitles.english: ...and I'll be looking forward to them. You all can write your thoughts and everything.

subtitles.original: チャンプルーな話し方になってますけど。 I'm excited to know what you guys think of the live.
subtitles.english: My way of speaking is getting all mixed up. I'm excited to know what you guys think of the live.

subtitles.original: You don't have to write it now, 今じゃなくても大丈夫ですけど、but I will be waiting!
subtitles.english: You don't have to write it now, it's okay if not right now, but I will be waiting!

subtitles.original: Yes, so just put any of your thoughts in the hashtag, okay?
subtitles.english: Yes, so just put any of your thoughts in the hashtag, okay?

subtitles.original: And next, I want to talk about the concept of the stage. Look at this! It's so cool, right?
subtitles.english: And next, I want to talk about the concept of the stage. Look at this! It's so cool, right?

subtitles.original: There's mysterious flames, mysterious locks, mysterious cans, mysterious... where's the liquid?
subtitles.english: There's mysterious flames, mysterious locks, mysterious cans, mysterious... where's the liquid?

subtitles.original: Well, there was like a blue liquid there, but I mean you saw it, right? Yeah!
subtitles.english: Well, there was like a blue liquid there, but I mean you saw it, right? Yeah!

subtitles.original: If you, um, I guess if you think of fire or flame, you know...
subtitles.english: If you, um, I guess if you think of fire or flame, you know...

subtitles.original: ...usually you guys think of the color red, right? Automatically.
subtitles.english: ...usually you guys think of the color red, right? Automatically.

subtitles.original: そうですね、火といえば赤のイメージが強いかもしれませんが...
subtitles.english: That's right, when you think of fire, the image of red might be strong, but...

subtitles.original: But actually, the blue flame is the strongest. Iya kan?
subtitles.english: But actually, the blue flame is the strongest. Right?

subtitles.original: But actually, 実はですね、青い炎が一番強い。と思います。
subtitles.english: But actually, blue flames are the strongest. I think.

subtitles.original: Yeah! So that's the theme of today's birthday.
subtitles.english: Yeah! So that's the theme of today's birthday.

subtitles.original: I want to show you guys just how hot a blue flame can be through hot songs and songs that will make you feel...
subtitles.english: I want to show you guys just how hot a blue flame can be through hot songs and songs that will make you feel...

subtitles.original: ...aduh gerah banget, so atsui, so woosh, gitu. Pokoknya just look forward to it, okay?
subtitles.english: ...so hot, so hot, so woosh, or something. Anyway, just look forward to it, okay?

subtitles.original: And the songs we've sung today, we have two songs.
subtitles.english: And the songs we've sung today, we have two songs.

subtitles.original: The first one was "Kill Kiss". すごく好きな曲で、Ave Mujica様の「Kill Kiss」です。
subtitles.english: The first one was "Kill Kiss". A song I really like, Ave Mujica's "Kill Kiss".

subtitles.original: そして二曲目は、私がすごい大好きなプロセカのユニット、Vivid BAD SQUAD様の「CRZY」でした。
subtitles.english: And the second song was "CRZY" by Vivid BAD SQUAD, a unit from ProSekai that I really love.

subtitles.original: And the second song was "CRZY" from a unit I really really like from ProSekai, Vivid BAD SQUAD. I hope you guys enjoyed it! Yay!
subtitles.english: And the second song was "CRZY" from a unit I really really like from ProSekai, Vivid BAD SQUAD. I hope you guys enjoyed it! Yay!

subtitles.original: Emang kayak Reine tuh suka banget gitu sama lagunya.
subtitles.english: Reine really loves the song.

subtitles.original: Jadi masih akan ada lebih banyak lagi. There's gonna be way more, more, more, more songs and I'm sure there's a lot of guests.
subtitles.english: So there's still more to come. There's gonna be way more, more, more, more songs and I'm sure there's a lot of guests.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys are excited for them! これからもね、もっともっと熱くなるから。ゲストも many many many many many...
subtitles.english: I hope you guys are excited for them! It's going to get even hotter from here. There are many guests too...
